thread.section_title: Store DJ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Store DJ | storedj.com.au
thread.title: Todd

author: Todd
title: Todd
text:
I first purchased through Store DJ after being mucked around by another company. This other company told me they had an item in stock (which they didn't) and then kept me waiting three weeks before admitting they weren't sure when they would next get stock. I cancelled that order and called Store DJ. They had the item that I had waited three weeks for, were very helpful on the phone and the item was shipped to me that day.
My most recent purchase involved their price match guarantee which was very fast. They ended up selling me my item at below cost price which is incredible!! They were helpful on the phone and the item was shipped that day.
Store DJ are great and they have an amazing group of staff who are always willing to help and go the extra mile.
